title: Contact info for Judith Sutcliffe?
content: Just wondering if anyone has live contact info for Judith. No replies to things sent to her PO box.
author: crossgrove

comments.content: Try here: [http://www.longbranchgallery.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417184049/http:/www.longbranchgallery.com/ "http://www.longbranchgallery.com/") - she is one of the owners. This is in Wisconsin and she also has ties to Iowa.
Is that PO box in Audubon, Iowa, Carl? Last I had contact with her, that's where she was. I have nothing more specific. It's a small town, though.
